channel.title: Houndeye Tinnitus Effect Missing
channel.description:
The effect does not at all work for me for whatever reason. I've tried enabling/disabling it, restarting the campaign, reinstalling the mod, nothing works. The ringing effect works on explosions like barrels and grenades but when Houndeyes attack I basically just go deaf. Their attacks just cause an instant 2-3 seconds of silence.
It's the only performance bug I've noticed so far and I'm at Blast Pit. Any clues?

item.title: Houndeye Tinnitus Effect Missing
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I get the sound fading out, no ring though. Had it on my entire first playthrough.

Read full topic

item.title: Houndeye Tinnitus Effect Missing
item.dc:creator: Gregorovich
item.description:
Pettifogg:

I didn’t get ringing but I did get the sound fading out. I just assumed that was the normal tinnitus effect, since I couldn’t remember what it sounded like. It’s nice either way.

Samerz

Read full topic

I just turned this on and it works for me fine…very nice effect.

item.title: Houndeye Tinnitus Effect Missing
item.dc:creator: Good_Apollo
item.description:
I wouldn’t really be bothered with it if it was a bug for everyone but I’ve asked some people and they say the ringing effect definitely works for them in every way.

I’m enjoying the game but it’s a nagging feeling to think that something specific to your system might be causing a bug to occur, gamebreaking or not.

Read full topic

item.title: Houndeye Tinnitus Effect Missing
item.dc:creator: your_evil_twin
item.description:
With it turned on I found that the world would momentarily go quiet after getting hit by a houndeye blast. There’s no high-pitched ringing sound like you would get from explosions. I think I prefer this world-gone-quiet effect to the HL2 grenade ear ringing effect. (Though at the moment I’ve turned the tinnitus off.)

Read full topic

item.title: Houndeye Tinnitus Effect Missing
item.dc:creator: Rikky007
item.description:
Good_Apollo:

Nobody? Am I really the only one experiencing this?

Yeah, I have the same problem, but It isn’t something bif, so I don’t bother with it. But youre right. Their attack is all the same with or without the tinnitus turned on.

Read full topic
